name: Fish Shop Simulator
storyline:
In Fish Shop Simulator, you manage your own aquatic store in a pleasant neighborhood of New York. Build your dream aquarium business by carefully selecting fish, aquariums, and decorations to create beautiful underwater environments for your customers.

Manage your own aquarium shop
Serve a variety of customers
Design and sell custom aquariums
Unlock new items, aquariums, and rare fish as you grow your store and attract more customers
Monitor stock levels and store decoration to maintain a prosperous business

Enjoy a blend of casual management and creative design as you transform your shop into an underwater paradise.
summary: Manage your own aquarium shop in a cozy neighborhood of New York. Buy and sell fish, aquariums, and decorations to friendly customers. Create beautifully decorated aquariums and make a profit by selling them!
